name: MoonShard
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME IS DIFFICULT!! BUT IT IS BEATABLE

Feel free to give us comments and feedback in the discussion board.

We suggest clicking the "Fullscreen" button in the bottom right corner prior to playing on a 1920x1080 monitor. Also, you need a mouse to play the game.

GameDev project for CSC 4821 - Mr. Weeks

Made by: 

Matthew Byars & Nate Evarts

Controls: Move- WASD

Jump - Space

Shoot - Click (Mouse 1)

Pause - P

Assets & Art:

https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/18720

https://www.deviantart.com/pixelgedon
